extensions.name: ms-python.isort
extensions.description: Integrates the isort tool into VS Code for organizing Python imports according to the PEP 8 guidelines, making code structure cleaner and more readable.

extensions.name: ms-python.python
extensions.description: Provides comprehensive Python language support in Visual Studio Code, including features such as IntelliSense, linting, debugging, code navigation, code formatting, Jupyter notebook support, refactoring, and much more.

extensions.name: ms-python.vscode-pylance
extensions.description: Offers fast and rich language support for Python in VS Code, powered by Pyright. It includes features like auto-imports, type information, auto-completion, and more, enhancing Python development productivity and experience.
